该公司投入巨资建设了一个直接与其工厂相连的铁路货运站。这使他们能够直接通过铁路接收大量木材和其他材料，从而大大减少了对卡车的依赖。通过取消从遥远铁路货场到目的地的“最后一英里”卡车运输，UFP节省了资金，缩短了交货时间，并减少了碳足迹。该项目突显了投资铁路基础设施以创建更高效、更可持续的供应链的重要性，尤其是在像纽约市这样的密集城市环境中。该举措还减少了交通拥堵并改善了城市内的空气质量。UFP铁路货运站可作为其他寻求优化物流和采用更环保的运输方式的企业的典范。

title: Julia Parsons, U.S. Navy Code Breaker During World War II, Dies at 104
summary:
Julia Parsons, a U.S. Navy code breaker during World War II, passed away at 104. She was a member of a secret team of women who deciphered messages to and from German U-boats, playing a crucial role in the Allied effort.

Parsons, who had a knack for puzzles, worked on cracking codes generated by the German Enigma machine. This machine, thought to be impenetrable by the Germans, used rotors to create complex codes. Her work provided Allied forces with vital information for avoiding, attacking, and sinking German submarines.

The cracking of the Enigma code was a multi-national effort. Polish mathematicians initially reverse-engineered the machine in the late 1930s, sharing their findings with the British. Alan Turing then refined the Bombe, a code-breaking machine based on the Polish work, after the Royal Navy captured a German submarine with an Enigma machine in 1941. The U.S. Navy then built its own version of the Bombe. This collective work led to the ability to decipher German communications, giving the Allies a significant advantage in the war.
chinese_title: 二战时期美国海军密码破译员朱莉娅·帕森斯去世，享年104岁
chinese_summary:
二战美海军密码破译员朱莉娅·帕森斯去世，享年104岁。她曾是秘密女子团队的成员，负责破译德国U型潜艇的来往信息，在盟军行动中发挥了关键作用。

帕森斯擅长解谜，致力于破解德国恩尼格玛密码机产生的密码。德国人认为这台机器坚不可摧，它利用转子生成复杂的密码。她的工作为盟军提供了避开、攻击和击沉德国潜艇的重要信息。

破解恩尼格玛密码是一项多国合作的成果。波兰数学家在20世纪30年代末初步逆向工程了该机器，并与英国分享了他们的发现。1941年，英国皇家海军捕获了一艘装有恩尼格玛密码机的德国潜艇后，艾伦·图灵根据波兰的研究成果改进了密码破译机“炸弹”。美国海军随后制造了自己的“炸弹”。这项集体工作使得破译德国通讯成为可能，为盟军在战争中提供了显著优势。

title: New atomic fountain clock joins group that keeps the world on time
summary:
NIST has launched its new atomic fountain clock, NIST-F4, establishing it as one of the world's most accurate timekeepers and positioning it as a primary frequency standard. This achievement enhances the stability and security of global timekeeping by joining a select group of similar clocks operated by only 10 countries.

NIST-F4 measures the unchanging frequency of cesium atoms and is so precise that it would only be off by a second if it had been running since the age of dinosaurs. It improves time signals crucial for telecommunications, financial trading, and other vital systems.

The clock works by cooling cesium atoms with lasers and then tossing them through a microwave chamber, where their resonant frequency is measured. The measurements are then used to calibrate Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

Building NIST-F4 was a years-long process involving redesigning the core of the clock and achieving extremely precise tolerances. Its accuracy has been validated to within 2.2 parts in 10 to the 16th, comparable to the best fountain clocks globally. NIST-F4 data is being sent to the International Bureau of Weights and Measures (BIPM) for official certification. It now operates alongside NIST-F3, contributing to the NIST time scale UTC(NIST).
chinese_title: 新型原子喷泉钟加入保持世界同步的行列
chinese_summary:
美国国家标准与技术研究院启用新型原子喷泉钟NIST-F4，使其成为世界上最精确的计时器之一，并确立其作为主要频率标准的地位。这一成就通过加入仅由10个国家运营的类似时钟的精选行列，增强了全球计时的稳定性和安全性。

NIST-F4测量铯原子不变的频率，其精度之高，若自恐龙时代运行至今，误差仅为一秒。它改进了对电信、金融交易和其他重要系统至关重要的时间信号。

该时钟的工作原理是使用激光冷却铯原子，然后将它们抛过微波腔，在微波腔中测量它们的共振频率。然后使用测量结果来校准协调世界时（UTC）。

建造NIST-F4是一个历时数年的过程，包括重新设计时钟的核心部件并实现极其精确的公差。其精度已验证到10的16次方分之2.2以内，与全球最好的喷泉钟相当。NIST-F4的数据正在发送给国际计量局（BIPM）进行官方认证。它现在与NIST-F3一起运行，为NIST时标UTC(NIST)做出贡献。

title: My sourdough starter has twins
summary:
This article details the author's experience participating in the Citizen Science Sourdough Project, a study by the HealthFerm Citizen Science group in collaboration with VUB Brussels and ETH Zurich universities. The author, a sourdough enthusiast, submitted a sample of their starter, "Stinkie," and recently received the results.

The report compared Stinkie to other sourdough starters, finding five possible "twins" in Switzerland, Romania, and Finland. This was surprising, given the influence of local factors on starter composition. The report also analyzed fermentation preferences, finding Stinkie to be more acidic, airier, and kept at a cooler temperature compared to other rye-based starters. Despite being 11 years old, Stinkie's pH level was average. However, it contained a higher than average amount of yeast and bacteria cells.

The second part of the report delved into the yeast and bacterial fingerprints. Stinkie's bacterial profile was dominated by *Lactobacillus brevis*, while its yeast profile showed a 100% presence of *Saccharomyces Cerevisiae*, indicating a monoculture despite overall high microbial counts. The author is considering altering their feeding routine to introduce more diversity into Stinkie's microbial composition.

The researchers also provided a multilingual AI assistant called Dough-Pro (accessed via ChatGPT) for further data exploration. The author concludes by expressing enthusiasm for citizen science research and the value of receiving personalized feedback.
chinese_title: 我的酸种酵母生了双胞胎。
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者参与“公民科学酸面包项目”的经历，该项目是由HealthFerm公民科学小组与VUB布鲁塞尔大学和苏黎世联邦理工学院合作开展的一项研究。作为一名酸面包爱好者，作者提交了他们的酵母种“Stinkie”的样本，并于最近收到了结果。

报告将Stinkie与其他酸面包酵母种进行了比较，发现有五个可能的“双胞胎”分别位于瑞士、罗马尼亚和芬兰。考虑到当地因素对酵母种成分的影响，这一发现令人惊讶。报告还分析了发酵偏好，发现与其他黑麦酵母种相比，Stinkie更酸、更蓬松，并且保持在较低的温度下。尽管已经有11年历史，Stinkie的pH值仍处于平均水平。然而，它含有高于平均水平的酵母和细菌细胞。

报告的第二部分深入研究了酵母和细菌的指纹图谱。Stinkie的细菌谱以短乳杆菌（*Lactobacillus brevis*）为主，而其酵母谱则显示100%存在酿酒酵母（*Saccharomyces Cerevisiae*），表明尽管微生物总数很高，但仍为单一种植。作者正在考虑改变他们的喂养方式，以在Stinkie的微生物组成中引入更多的多样性。

研究人员还提供了一个名为Dough-Pro（通过ChatGPT访问）的多语言AI助手，用于进一步的数据探索。作者最后表达了对公民科学研究的热情以及收到个性化反馈的价值。

title: What It Takes to Defend a Cybersecurity Company from Today's Adversaries
summary:
This report by SentinelOne highlights the increasing threat posed to cybersecurity companies by various adversaries, ranging from financially motivated cybercriminals to nation-state actors. It emphasizes that security vendors are prime targets due to their access to sensitive data and insights into the protection of numerous environments.

The report details specific instances, including:

*   **DPRK IT Workers Posing as Job Applicants:** A large-scale campaign involving North Korean IT workers using fake personas to gain employment within Western tech companies, including SentinelOne. SentinelOne countered this through intelligence-driven engagement with talent acquisition teams, identifying and interacting with suspicious applicants.
*   **Ransomware Group Capability Development:** Ransomware operators actively seek access to enterprise security platforms to disable protections, manipulate configurations, or suppress detections. This is facilitated by a growing underground economy where access to security tools is bought, sold, and rented. The report mentions the Nitrogen ransomware group, which impersonates legitimate companies to acquire security product licenses for testing and evasion purposes.

SentinelOne emphasizes the importance of internal collaboration, equipping frontline business units with threat context and clear escalation paths. Codifying insights with automation to proactively block suspicious activity is also crucial. They advocate for making cross-functional threat awareness standard operating procedure and integrating detection logic at the edge of business systems. This highlights a challenge for the security industry: reseller diligence and KYC enforcement are part of the threat surface. By improving these they can prevent adversaries from gaining ways to elevate their campaigns, often at lower costs and lower risks than the black market.

SentinelOne 强调内部协作的重要性，为一线业务部门配备威胁背景和清晰的升级路径。将洞察力与自动化相结合，以主动阻止可疑活动也至关重要。他们主张将跨职能的威胁意识作为标准操作程序，并将检测逻辑集成到业务系统的边缘。这突出了安全行业面临的挑战：经销商尽职调查和 KYC 执行是威胁面的一部分。 通过改进这些措施，他们可以防止对手获得提升其活动的途径，而且通常比黑市的成本更低、风险更低。

title: If you're in the market for a $1,900 color E Ink monitor, one of them exists now

title: Linux in Excel
summary:
This article describes a project where the author managed to run Linux within Microsoft Excel. The key to this seemingly impossible feat is the use of `mini-rv32ima`, an emulator. Instead of re-writing the emulator in VBA or using Excel formulas (which would be incredibly complex), the author created a separate DLL file using MSVC. This DLL, named `fun.dll`, houses the emulator code.

The Excel spreadsheet then uses a VBA macro to load the DLL and call the emulator. The emulator processes the input provided in cell C2 (thanks to Endermanch), and its output is written back into the spreadsheet's cells.

The author admits the project is buggy and was created primarily for fun, rather than as a robust or practical application. The construction involves a VBA macro calling the emulator from a separate compiled DLL rather than direct VBA or Excel function emulation. The steps for building the DLL using `cl dllmain.c /LD /Fefun.dll` are provided, along with instructions to update the DLL path within the Excel file and input text in cell C2. The project demonstrates an unconventional and technically interesting approach to running Linux, albeit in a limited and imperfect form, within the Excel environment.

title: Retailers will soon have only about 7 weeks of full inventories left
summary: According to Port of Los Angeles Executive Director Gene Seroka, retailers are facing dwindling inventory levels, potentially having only about seven weeks of full inventories remaining. This situation is attributed to the ongoing U.S.-China trade war, which is impacting supply chains and trade flows. title: Jepsen: Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4
summary:
This Jepsen report analyzes the consistency guarantees of Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4 in a multi-AZ configuration. Using a modified version of Jepsen's PostgreSQL testing suite, the tests revealed that RDS for PostgreSQL does *not* guarantee Snapshot Isolation, despite PostgreSQL's "Repeatable Read" level theoretically providing it.

The tests uncovered G-nonadjacent cycles, including instances of Long Fork anomalies, indicating a weaker isolation level. These cycles demonstrate that transactions can observe inconsistent histories, where transactions read writes from some, but not all, other concurrent transactions, violating the constraints of Snapshot Isolation. The anomalies were observed across multiple PostgreSQL versions on RDS, from 13.15 to 17.4.

The report suggests that Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL may instead be providing Parallel Snapshot Isolation, a consistency model weaker than standard Snapshot Isolation. This is surprising, as single-node PostgreSQL has previously appeared to offer Strong Snapshot Isolation.

The report advises users of Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL to analyze their transaction patterns for potential Long Fork scenarios and to design tests that validate their critical invariants. It also suggests that Snapshot Isolation might be recoverable by exclusively using the writer endpoint or ensuring that safety-critical transactions include at least one write. The authors emphasize the exploratory nature of their testing and acknowledge that while they can demonstrate the presence of bugs, they cannot guarantee their absence or prove overall correctness.
chinese_title: Jepsen：Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4
chinese_summary:
Jepsen报告：Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4 一致性分析

本Jepsen报告分析了多可用区配置下Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4的一致性保证。 通过使用Jepsen PostgreSQL测试套件的修改版本，测试表明，尽管PostgreSQL的“可重复读”级别理论上应提供快照隔离，但RDS for PostgreSQL *不能*保证快照隔离。

测试发现了G-非相邻环，包括长分叉异常的实例，表明隔离级别较弱。 这些环表明，事务可以观察到不一致的历史，即事务读取来自某些并发事务的写入，但并非所有并发事务的写入，从而违反了快照隔离的约束。 这些异常在RDS上的多个PostgreSQL版本（从13.15到17.4）中被观察到。

该报告表明，Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL可能提供的是并行快照隔离，这是一种比标准快照隔离弱的一致性模型。 这令人惊讶，因为单节点PostgreSQL以前似乎提供强快照隔离。

该报告建议Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL的用户分析其事务模式中潜在的长分叉场景，并设计测试来验证其关键不变性。 它还建议，可能可以通过专门使用写入器端点或确保安全关键事务至少包含一次写入来恢复快照隔离。 作者强调了其测试的探索性，并承认虽然他们可以证明存在错误，但他们不能保证不存在错误或证明总体正确性。

Second, this panorama is converted into a full 3D scene, typically represented as 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) or mesh models, enabling interactive exploration from any viewpoint.

The article showcases examples of scenes generated from various prompts, ranging from photorealistic living rooms and underwater cities to cyberpunk streets and medieval castles, demonstrating the tool's versatility. The site encourages users to explore the code and start generating their own 3D worlds by visiting the GitHub repository.

title: An illustrated guide to automatic sparse differentiation
summary:
This article introduces Automatic Sparse Differentiation (ASD), a technique that leverages the sparsity of Jacobians and Hessians to accelerate automatic differentiation (AD) and reduce memory usage. While AD is commonly used in machine learning, ASD remains relatively unknown, despite its potential performance benefits.

The article begins with a review of traditional AD, covering Jacobian computation using forward and reverse modes. It highlights AD's advantage of operating matrix-free, avoiding the explicit computation and storage of dense intermediate Jacobian matrices.

The core of ASD lies in exploiting sparsity patterns in Jacobians. The key idea is to identify structurally orthogonal columns or rows in the Jacobian matrix. Multiple such columns/rows can be materialized simultaneously with a single Jacobian-vector product (JVP) in forward mode or vector-Jacobian product (VJP) in reverse mode. This significantly reduces the number of JVPs/VJPs needed to materialize the Jacobian.

A crucial challenge is determining the sparsity pattern without materializing the full Jacobian. ASD addresses this through two main steps: pattern detection and coloring. Pattern detection identifies the structure of the sparse matrix. The coloring step then groups structurally orthogonal columns/rows together, enabling efficient computation through compressed AD. A final decompression step reassembles the final Jacobian.

In summary, ASD encompasses pattern detection, coloring, compressed AD, and decompression, significantly improving the efficiency of AD for sparse Jacobians and Hessians.
chinese_title: 自动稀疏微分图解指南
chinese_summary:
本文介绍自动稀疏微分 (ASD)，一种利用雅可比矩阵和海森矩阵的稀疏性来加速自动微分 (AD) 并减少内存使用量的技术。 尽管自动微分已广泛应用于机器学习中，但自动稀疏微分仍然相对不为人知，尽管它具有潜在的性能优势。

本文首先回顾了传统的自动微分，涵盖了使用前向和反向模式计算雅可比矩阵。 它强调了自动微分的矩阵无关优势，避免了显式计算和存储密集型中间雅可比矩阵。

自动稀疏微分的核心在于利用雅可比矩阵中的稀疏模式。 关键思想是识别雅可比矩阵中结构上正交的列或行。 多个这样的列/行可以同时通过前向模式下的单个雅可比矩阵-向量积 (JVP) 或反向模式下的向量-雅可比矩阵积 (VJP) 实现。 这大大减少了实现雅可比矩阵所需的雅可比矩阵-向量积/向量-雅可比矩阵积的数量。

一个关键的挑战是在不实现完整的雅可比矩阵的情况下确定稀疏模式。 自动稀疏微分通过两个主要步骤来解决这个问题：模式检测和着色。 模式检测识别稀疏矩阵的结构。 然后，着色步骤将结构上正交的列/行分组在一起，从而可以通过压缩的自动微分进行高效计算。 最后的解压缩步骤重新组装最终的雅可比矩阵。

总而言之，自动稀疏微分包括模式检测、着色、压缩自动微分和解压缩，从而显著提高了稀疏雅可比矩阵和海森矩阵的自动微分效率。

title: Phi-4 Reasoning Models
summary:
Microsoft has unveiled its Phi-4-reasoning family of small language models (SLMs): Phi-4-reasoning, Phi-4-reasoning-plus, and Phi-4-mini-reasoning. These models are designed for complex reasoning tasks like mathematical problem-solving and multi-step inference, typically requiring larger models. They aim to balance size and performance, making them suitable for resource-constrained environments.

Phi-4-reasoning is a 14-billion parameter model trained using supervised fine-tuning on curated reasoning demonstrations. Phi-4-reasoning-plus builds on this, further trained with reinforcement learning to leverage more inference-time compute for increased accuracy. Impressively, both models outperform larger models like OpenAI's o1-mini and DeepSeek-R1-Distill-Llama-70B on many benchmarks, including advanced math and science questions.

Phi-4-mini-reasoning is a compact model optimized for mathematical reasoning, ideal for educational applications and edge deployment. It was fine-tuned on a vast dataset of math problems and demonstrates superior performance compared to other models of comparable or larger size.

The Phi models are available on Azure AI Foundry and HuggingFace. Microsoft emphasizes the integration of these models into its ecosystem, notably within Copilot+ PCs with the NPU-optimized Phi Silica variant for efficient on-device AI. Microsoft stresses its commitment to responsible AI, outlining the safety measures incorporated into the development of the Phi models.

title: Joining Sun Microsystems – 40 years ago (2022)

title: A competing theory to 'dark energy' suggests universe has different time zones
summary:
This article discusses a competing theory to "dark energy" that challenges the standard cosmological model. The "timescape model" proposes that the universe doesn't need dark energy to explain its apparent accelerating expansion. Instead, it suggests the universe has different "time zones" due to variations in density and the effects of general relativity.

The standard model assumes the universe is uniform, requiring dark energy to explain the observed accelerated expansion based on supernova measurements. However, newer, more precise data reveals irregularities and inconsistencies that challenge this assumption.

The timescape model argues that the universe's structure, with dense regions of galaxies and vast empty voids, impacts the passage of time. Time passes more slowly in denser regions, like where Earth is located, and faster in the voids. This difference in time passage leads observers in denser regions to perceive the universe as expanding at an accelerating rate, even though the voids are simply expanding at their original rate.

Ryan Ridden, a researcher involved in the timescape model, explains that the observed accelerated expansion is a consequence of our location within a dense region. The cumulative effect of these varying time zones creates the illusion of overall acceleration. The timescape model questions the fundamental assumption of a uniform universe and incorporates general relativity more fully, providing an alternative explanation for the universe's expansion without invoking dark energy.
chinese_title: 一种与“暗能量”竞争的理论认为宇宙具有不同的时区。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了一种与挑战标准宇宙学模型的“暗能量”竞争的理论。“时空景观模型”提出，宇宙不需要暗能量来解释其表面上的加速膨胀。相反，它认为由于密度变化和广义相对论的影响，宇宙存在不同的“时区”。

标准模型假设宇宙是均匀的，需要暗能量来解释基于超新星测量观察到的加速膨胀。然而，更新、更精确的数据揭示了挑战这一假设的不规则性和不一致性。

时空景观模型认为，宇宙的结构，包括星系的密集区域和广阔的空洞，会影响时间的流逝。在像地球所在的较密集的区域，时间流逝得更慢，而在空洞中，时间流逝得更快。这种时间流逝的差异导致位于较密集区域的观察者认为宇宙正在加速膨胀，即使空洞只是以其原始速率膨胀。

参与时空景观模型的研究员瑞恩·瑞登解释说，观察到的加速膨胀是我们在密集区域中的位置所致。这些不同时区的累积效应产生了整体加速的错觉。时空景观模型质疑了宇宙均匀性的基本假设，并更充分地融入了广义相对论，从而为宇宙的膨胀提供了一种替代解释，而无需借助暗能量。

title: Researchers are studying how to minimize human impact on public lands
summary:
Researchers are increasingly focused on minimizing human impact on public lands, balancing conservation with accessibility. Historically, strategies like permits and fees were common, but modern land managers prefer encouraging behavioral changes. This shift is driven by a new generation of researchers using data-driven approaches like surveys and remote sensing to analyze policy impacts.

Indirect management methods, such as carefully designed trails, are prioritized to guide visitor behavior. The community-based social marketing (CBSM) framework identifies obstacles to eco-friendly behavior and suggests targeted strategies to overcome them. While CBSM faces challenges in wilderness conservation due to its labor-intensive nature, it offers a promising approach.

Researchers like Will Rice are studying the fairness and effectiveness of different regulatory methods. They consider how restrictions impact various demographics, such as agricultural workers who can't plan far in advance. A guidebook was created to aid land managers in choosing appropriate strategies, highlighting how reservation systems can disadvantage certain groups.

Iree Wheeler's research at Arches National Park revealed that visitors were generally accepting of a timed-entry system, especially when its purpose and logistics were clearly communicated. The overall goal is to create management strategies that preserve both the environment and visitor experience while considering the broader impact on surrounding areas.
chinese_title: 研究人员正在研究如何最大限度地减少人类对公共土地的影响。
chinese_summary:
研究人员越来越关注如何尽可能减少人类活动对公共土地的影响，同时平衡环境保护与可达性。 历史上，许可和收费等策略很常见，但现代土地管理者更倾向于鼓励行为改变。 这种转变是由新一代研究人员推动的，他们使用数据驱动的方法（如调查和遥感）来分析政策影响。

间接管理方法，例如精心设计的步道，被优先用于引导游客行为。 基于社区的社会营销（CBSM）框架识别出环保行为的障碍，并提出有针对性的策略来克服这些障碍。 虽然CBSM由于其劳动密集型性质而在荒野保护方面面临挑战，但它提供了一种有前景的方法。

像Will Rice这样的研究人员正在研究不同监管方法的公平性和有效性。 他们会考虑限制措施如何影响不同的人群，例如无法提前计划的农业工人。 创建了一本指南，以帮助土地管理者选择合适的策略，强调了预订系统如何使某些群体处于不利地位。

Iree Wheeler在拱门国家公园的研究表明，游客普遍接受定时进入系统，特别是当其目的和物流得到清晰传达时。 总体目标是制定既能保护环境又能改善游客体验的管理策略，同时考虑到对周边地区的更广泛影响。

title: Chain of Recursive Thoughts: Make AI think harder by making it argue with itself
summary:
This article introduces CoRT (Chain of Recursive Thoughts), a method to enhance AI reasoning by having the AI argue with itself. The core idea is to make the AI iteratively refine its responses through self-evaluation and competitive alternative generation.

Here's how it works:

1.  The AI generates an initial response to a prompt.
2.  The AI determines how many rounds of self-reflection are needed.
3.  For each round, the AI generates multiple alternative responses.
4.  The AI evaluates all generated responses, including the current best.
5.  The AI selects the best response based on its evaluation.

This process repeats for the determined number of rounds, resulting in a refined final response. The article highlights that using CoRT with Mistral 3.1 24B significantly improved its performance, especially in programming tasks.

The article also provides instructions for using a web UI (still in early development) and a command-line version, including setup steps and dependency installation using `pip install -r requirements.txt` and setting the `OPENROUTER_API_KEY`. It invites contributions to further improve the method and states that it is licensed under MIT. The core of the method's success lies in self-evaluation, competitive alternative generation, iterative refinement, and dynamic thinking depth.
chinese_title: 递归思维链：让AI通过自我辩论进行更深入的思考
chinese_summary:
本文介绍 CoRT（递归思维链），一种通过让 AI 与自身辩论来增强 AI 推理能力的方法。其核心思想是使 AI 通过自我评估和竞争性替代方案生成来迭代地完善其响应。

以下是其工作原理：

1. AI 生成对提示的初始响应。
2. AI 确定所需的自我反思轮数。
3. 对于每一轮，AI 生成多个替代响应。
4. AI 评估所有生成的响应，包括当前最佳响应。
5. AI 基于其评估选择最佳响应。

此过程重复进行所确定的轮数，从而产生一个经过改进的最终响应。文章强调，将 CoRT 与 Mistral 3.1 24B 结合使用可显著提高其性能，尤其是在编程任务中。

文章还提供了使用 Web UI（仍在早期开发阶段）和命令行版本的说明，包括设置步骤和使用 `pip install -r requirements.txt` 安装依赖项以及设置 `OPENROUTER_API_KEY`。它邀请大家贡献力量，以进一步改进该方法，并声明该方法已获得 MIT 许可。该方法成功的核心在于自我评估、竞争性替代方案生成、迭代改进和动态思维深度。

title: Google Play sees 47% decline in apps since start of last year
summary:
A recent analysis by Appfigures reveals a significant decline in the number of apps available on the Google Play Store. From the start of 2024 to the present, the number of apps has dropped by approximately 47%, going from 3.4 million to 1.8 million, a trend not observed in Apple's iOS App Store.

Google attributes this decline to stricter quality requirements implemented in July 2024, which ban apps with limited functionality, content, or those designed without a purpose. This purge aims to eliminate scammy, spammy, and low-quality apps, improving user experience and developer visibility.

Google also points to increased investment in AI for threat detection, stronger privacy policies, improved developer tools, and expanded human reviews. These efforts led to the prevention of 2.36 million policy-violating apps and the banning of over 158,000 developer accounts.

While the EU's trader status rule requiring developers to share their information could be a potential factor, Apple's app store saw no decline after implementing the same requirement. Appfigures notes that the decline in Google Play apps began even before the official policy changes, though the cause remains unknown. Despite the app purge, the number of new releases on Google Play has increased by 7.1% year-over-year as of April.
chinese_title: 自去年初以来，Google Play应用数量下降47%
chinese_summary:
Appfigures 最新分析显示，Google Play 商店应用数量大幅下降。从 2024 年初至今，应用数量已减少约 47%，从 340 万降至 180 万，这一趋势在 Apple 的 iOS App Store 中未见。

Google 将此归因于 2024 年 7 月实施的更严格的质量要求，禁止功能、内容有限或设计目的不明确的应用。此次清理旨在消除欺诈、垃圾和低质量应用，从而改善用户体验和开发者可见性。

Google 还指出，增加了对人工智能在威胁检测方面的投资，加强了隐私政策，改进了开发者工具，并扩大了人工审核范围。这些努力促使 236 万个违反政策的应用被阻止，超过 158,000 个开发者帐户被封禁。

虽然欧盟的交易者身份规则（要求开发者分享其信息）可能是一个潜在因素，但 Apple 的应用商店在实施相同要求后并未出现下降。Appfigures 指出，Google Play 应用的下降甚至在官方政策变更之前就开始了，但原因尚不清楚。尽管进行了应用清理，截至 4 月，Google Play 上新发布的数量同比增长了 7.1%。

title: Albert Stevens, the most radioactive man
summary:
Albert Stevens, a house painter, was subjected to a secret involuntary human radiation experiment during the Manhattan Project. In 1945, he was injected with plutonium without his knowledge under the false belief he had terminal cancer. He survived for 20 years, accumulating the highest known radiation dose in any human: 64 Sv (6400 rem).

Early Manhattan Project research, aimed at developing nuclear weapons, studied plutonium's effects on the human body. To trace plutonium's course, experiments began on animals, then humans. Stevens, designated CAL-1, was chosen for a U.C. San Francisco test led by Dr. Joseph G. Hamilton. Stevens's gastric ulcer was misdiagnosed as cancer, motivating his selection.

After the injection, Stevens underwent surgery to remove what surgeons believed was a cancerous mass. They discovered that he never had cancer. Researchers collected his urine and stool samples, purportedly studying his cancer recovery, but in reality monitoring the plutonium's excretion. While researchers knew he never had cancer, Stevens was never told the truth about his condition or the experiment.

Over two decades, Stevens received approximately 6400 rem (64 Sv). He died in 1966 of heart failure. Analysis of his cremated remains confirmed he received the highest dose of radiation to his bones and liver compared to other plutonium test subjects. Journalist Eileen Welsome's investigative work brought the Stevens case and other unethical human experiments to public attention.
chinese_title: 阿尔伯特·史蒂文斯，辐射量最高的人
chinese_summary:
阿尔伯特·史蒂文斯，一位油漆工，在曼哈顿计划期间遭受了秘密的非自愿人体辐射实验。1945年，他在不知情的情况下被注射了钚，当时他被错误地认为患有晚期癌症。他存活了20年，积累了已知人体中最高的辐射剂量：64希沃特（6400雷姆）。

早期曼哈顿计划的研究旨在开发核武器，研究了钚对人体的影响。为了追踪钚的轨迹，实验首先在动物身上进行，然后是人体。史蒂文斯，代号CAL-1，被选中参加由约瑟夫·G·汉密尔顿博士领导的加州大学旧金山分校的测试。史蒂文斯的胃溃疡被误诊为癌症，促使他被选中。

注射后，史蒂文斯接受了手术，切除了外科医生认为的癌性肿块。他们发现他从未患过癌症。研究人员收集了他的尿液和粪便样本，据称是研究他的癌症恢复情况，但实际上是监测钚的排泄情况。虽然研究人员知道他从未患过癌症，但史蒂文斯从未被告知他病情的真相或实验的情况。

二十多年来，史蒂文斯接受了大约6400雷姆（64希沃特）的辐射。他于1966年死于心力衰竭。对他火化遗骸的分析证实，与其他钚测试对象相比，他骨骼和肝脏受到的辐射剂量最高。记者艾琳·韦尔瑟姆的调查报道使史蒂文斯案件和其他不道德的人体实验引起了公众的关注。

title: Windows RDP lets you log-in using revoked passwords. Microsoft is ok with that
summary:
Microsoft acknowledges that Windows' Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) allows users to log in with revoked passwords, a behavior the company considers a design decision to prevent lockouts, not a security vulnerability. Security researcher Daniel Wade reported that even after a user changes their password due to a suspected compromise, the old password can still grant RDP access, bypassing cloud verification, MFA, and conditional access policies. This is because RDP caches credentials locally, validating logins against this cache rather than the online identity provider.

Wade and security analyst Will Dormann warn this creates a significant security risk, potentially granting attackers persistent, silent remote access even after a password change. Microsoft updated its documentation to mention the caching behavior but offers no clear guidance on mitigation. Dormann suggests configuring RDP to only authenticate against local credentials.

Microsoft admitted to being aware of the issue since August 2023 but decided against a code change due to compatibility concerns. The article highlights the potential for compromised Microsoft or Azure accounts to provide a backdoor through RDP, even after the account password has been updated, and criticizes the lack of proactive communication or solutions from Microsoft.
chinese_title: Windows RDP允许您使用已撤销的密码登录。微软对此表示可以接受。
chinese_summary:
微软承认Windows的远程桌面协议(RDP)允许用户使用已撤销的密码登录，该公司认为这是一种旨在防止锁定的设计决策，而非安全漏洞。安全研究员丹尼尔·韦德报告称，即使在用户因怀疑泄露而更改密码后，旧密码仍然可以授予RDP访问权限，绕过云验证、多因素身份验证和条件访问策略。这是因为RDP会在本地缓存凭据，并根据此缓存验证登录，而不是在线身份提供商。

韦德和安全分析师威尔·多尔曼警告称，这会造成重大的安全风险，可能会授予攻击者持久、静默的远程访问权限，即使在密码更改后也是如此。微软更新了其文档以提及缓存行为，但未提供明确的缓解指南。多尔曼建议将RDP配置为仅针对本地凭据进行身份验证。

微软承认自2023年8月以来就已意识到该问题，但由于兼容性问题而决定不进行代码更改。 该文章强调了即使在帐户密码更新后，受损的Microsoft或Azure帐户也可能通过RDP提供后门，并批评了微软缺乏积极主动的沟通或解决方案。

title: ArkFlow: High-performance Rust stream processing engine
summary:
ArkFlow is a high-performance Rust-based stream processing engine designed for handling data streams efficiently. It leverages the Rust language and Tokio async runtime for low latency and high throughput.

Key features include support for multiple data sources like Kafka, MQTT, HTTP, files, and databases. It also offers powerful processing capabilities, including SQL queries, JSON and Protobuf handling, and batch processing. ArkFlow is designed with a modular architecture, allowing for easy extension with custom input, output, and processor components.

The engine uses YAML configuration files to define data streams, processing pipelines, and input/output sources. A stream configuration includes the input source, processing pipeline (with thread count and processors), output target, error output target, and buffer configuration.

ArkFlow offers various processors, including JSON transformations, SQL queries, and Protobuf encoding/decoding. Supported output targets include Kafka, MQTT, HTTP, standard output, and a "drop" option to discard data. Buffer components (like memory buffer) are provided for backpressure handling.

The documentation provides examples of Kafka to Kafka data processing and test data generation with SQL processing. It's licensed under Apache 2.0 and encourages community involvement via Discord.
chinese_title: ArkFlow：高性能Rust流处理引擎
chinese_summary:
ArkFlow是一款高性能的基于Rust的流处理引擎，专为高效处理数据流而设计。它利用Rust语言和Tokio异步运行时来实现低延迟和高吞吐量。

主要功能包括支持多种数据源，如Kafka、MQTT、HTTP、文件和数据库。它还提供强大的处理能力，包括SQL查询、JSON和Protobuf处理以及批处理。ArkFlow采用模块化架构设计，可以轻松扩展自定义输入、输出和处理器组件。

该引擎使用YAML配置文件来定义数据流、处理管道以及输入/输出源。流配置包括输入源、处理管道（具有线程数和处理器）、输出目标、错误输出目标和缓冲区配置。

ArkFlow提供各种处理器，包括JSON转换、SQL查询和Protobuf编码/解码。支持的输出目标包括Kafka、MQTT、HTTP、标准输出以及“drop”选项以丢弃数据。提供缓冲组件（如内存缓冲区）用于反压处理。

该文档提供了Kafka到Kafka数据处理以及使用SQL处理生成测试数据的示例。它采用Apache 2.0许可，并鼓励通过Discord参与社区。

title: OCaml's Wings for Machine Learning
summary:
Raven is a new OCaml ecosystem aiming to bring efficient and intuitive machine learning and data science capabilities to the language, comparable to Python. Currently in pre-alpha, Raven prioritizes developer experience and seamless integration, leveraging OCaml's type safety and performance.

The ecosystem consists of several sub-projects:

*   **Ndarray:** The core, providing high-performance numerical computation with CPU/GPU support, similar to NumPy. Includes related libraries like Ndarray-CV, Ndarray-IO, and Ndarray-Datasets.
*   **Quill:** An interactive notebook application akin to Jupyter for data exploration and prototyping.
*   **Hugin:** A visualization library for generating publication-quality plots.
*   **Rune:** A library for automatic differentiation and JIT compilation, inspired by JAX.

Raven aims to fill gaps in OCaml's data science capabilities by offering counterparts to popular Python libraries. The project is actively seeking user feedback and contributions, welcoming bug reports, feature requests, and code contributions. Raven is licensed under the ISC License, making it free for personal and commercial use. While still under development, the Ndarray and Hugin components are feature-complete for the first alpha release, Rune is in the proof-of-concept stage, and Quill is in early prototyping.
chinese_title: OCaml在机器学习领域的应用
chinese_summary:
Raven：旨在为 OCaml 带来高效直观的机器学习和数据科学能力，与 Python 相媲美的新生态系统。目前处于 pre-alpha 阶段，Raven 优先考虑开发者体验和无缝集成，并充分利用 OCaml 的类型安全和性能。

该生态系统由几个子项目组成：

*   **Ndarray：** 核心，提供具有 CPU/GPU 支持的高性能数值计算，类似于 NumPy。包括相关库，如 Ndarray-CV、Ndarray-IO 和 Ndarray-Datasets。
*   **Quill：** 类似于 Jupyter 的交互式笔记本应用程序，用于数据探索和原型设计。
*   **Hugin：** 用于生成出版质量绘图的可视化库。
*   **Rune：** 受 JAX 启发的自动微分和 JIT 编译库。

Raven 旨在通过提供与流行的 Python 库对应的功能，来填补 OCaml 在数据科学能力方面的空白。该项目正在积极寻求用户反馈和贡献，欢迎提交错误报告、功能请求和代码贡献。Raven 在 ISC 许可下获得许可，可免费用于个人和商业用途。虽然仍在开发中，但 Ndarray 和 Hugin 组件的功能已完善，可用于首次 alpha 发布，Rune 处于概念验证阶段，Quill 处于早期原型设计阶段。

title: Mission Impossible: Managing AI Agents in the Real World
summary:
In "Mission Impossible: Managing AI Agents in the Real World," David Bethune offers battle-tested techniques for controlling AI agents in software development. He emphasizes that AI tools are rapidly evolving, making it crucial to carefully plan and constrain the context in which these agents operate.

The article highlights that the quality of input materials (code, data, prompts) is paramount for an AI agent's success, and the specific tool used is less important than the workflow it offers. Developers must be realistic about their own skills and actively guide the AI's actions, knowing when to investigate and when to act.

Bethune argues that while "vibe coding" (simply asking for results) can produce quick prototypes, it's unsuitable for production code. Instead, he advocates for creating reusable plans that can be iteratively refined and rerun. He suggests dividing tasks into modular parts and emphasizes the importance of having a clear understanding of how to implement the desired functionality.

The article stresses that AI agents don't follow strict rules but predict the next most likely output. Over-reliance on the AI's perceived miracles can lead to complex problems down the line.

Bethune proposes treating plans as "first-class citizens" by storing them in a dedicated folder within the repository, using Markdown format. These plans, containing code and data, become runnable programs that can be version-controlled and referenced in future tasks, which is a more reliable approach than relying on pre-made plans found online. In short: prioritize careful planning, high-quality inputs, and iterative refinement to effectively manage AI agents.
chinese_title: 不可能的任务：在现实世界中管理人工智能体
chinese_summary:
在《不可能的任务：在现实世界中管理人工智能代理》中，David Bethune 提供了在软件开发中控制人工智能代理的实战技巧。他强调，人工智能工具正在迅速发展，因此务必仔细规划和约束这些代理运行的环境。

文章强调，输入材料（代码、数据、提示）的质量对于人工智能代理的成功至关重要，而且所使用的具体工具不如它提供的工作流程重要。开发人员必须对自己自身的技能有清醒的认识，并积极指导人工智能的行为，知道何时进行调查，何时采取行动。

Bethune 认为，虽然“凭感觉编程”（简单地要求结果）可以产生快速原型，但它不适合生产代码。相反，他提倡创建可重复使用的计划，这些计划可以迭代改进和重新运行。他建议将任务划分为模块化部分，并强调清楚理解如何实现所需功能的重要性。

文章强调，人工智能代理不遵循严格的规则，而是预测下一个最可能的输出。过度依赖人工智能看似奇迹般的能力可能会导致日后出现复杂的问题。

Bethune 建议将计划视为“一等公民”，将其以 Markdown 格式存储在存储库中的专用文件夹中。这些包含代码和数据的计划成为可运行的程序，可以进行版本控制并在未来的任务中引用，这是一种比依赖在线预制计划更可靠的方法。简而言之：优先考虑周密的计划、高质量的输入和迭代改进，以有效地管理人工智能代理。

title: The ancient psychedelics myth: Tourists told stories 'they find interesting'
summary:
This article challenges the widespread belief that ancient cultures universally used psychedelics like ayahuasca and magic mushrooms for healing purposes, a concept the author calls the Global Archaic Psychedelic Shamanism (Gaps) hypothesis. Anthropological research in the Amazon, particularly by Bernd Brabec de Mori, suggests that ayahuasca's use in the region is relatively recent, possibly within the last 300 years, and influenced by tourism where stories are tailored for outsiders.

The article highlights the popularization of "magic mushrooms" by Robert Gordon Wasson in the 1950s, which helped establish the idea of ancient and widespread psychedelic use. However, the article points to the Huthac database project by Martin Fortier that aimed to exhaustively document hallucinogenic use across cultures, revealing that reliable evidence for early psychedelic usage was limited to a small portion of Indigenous American groups and that even within those regions, usage was rare. Ecologist Andy Letcher's research reinforces this, confirming only pre-Columbian Mexico and Northern Eurasia as definite cases of traditional hallucinogenic mushroom consumption.

While some scholars point to symbolic evidence in art and literature to support the ancient use of psychedelics, such as mushroom stones in Peru and depictions in Mesoamerican codices, the author cautions that these interpretations are often open to alternative explanations. The article concludes that psychedelics might be more of an exception in human history, not the rule, and that popular narratives often romanticize the role of psychedelics in ancient cultures.
chinese_title: 远古致幻剂之谜：游客们被告知“他们觉得有趣”的故事
chinese_summary:
本文挑战了一种普遍的观点，即古代文化普遍使用死藤水和迷幻蘑菇等致幻剂进行治疗。作者将这一概念称为“全球古代致幻萨满教”(Gaps)假说。在亚马逊地区进行的，特别是Bernd Brabec de Mori的人类学研究表明，死藤水在该地区的使用相对较晚，可能在近300年内，并且受到旅游业的影响，故事是为外来者量身定制的。

本文强调了罗伯特·戈登·沃森在20世纪50年代对“迷幻蘑菇”的推广，这有助于确立古代和广泛使用致幻剂的观念。然而，本文指出马丁·福蒂耶的Huthac数据库项目旨在详尽记录各种文化中使用致幻剂的情况，结果表明，早期使用致幻剂的可靠证据仅限于少数美洲原住民群体，即使在这些地区，使用也很罕见。生态学家安迪·莱彻的研究也证实了这一点，仅确认前哥伦布时期的墨西哥和北欧亚大陆是传统食用致幻蘑菇的明确案例。

虽然一些学者指出艺术和文学中的象征性证据来支持古代使用致幻剂的说法，例如秘鲁的蘑菇石和中美洲古抄本中的描绘，但作者警告说，这些解释往往可以有其他解释。本文总结说，致幻剂在人类历史上可能更像是一个例外，而不是规则，并且流行的叙事往往浪漫化了致幻剂在古代文化中的作用。

title: Port of Los Angeles says shipping volume will plummet 35% next week
summary:
The Port of Los Angeles anticipates a significant 35% drop in shipping volume next week due to the impact of increased tariffs on Chinese goods. Executive Director Gene Seroka attributes this "precipitous drop" to major American retailers halting shipments from China.

China accounts for roughly 45% of the port's business, and while some companies may seek alternative sources in Southeast Asia, the overall volume is expected to remain low without a trade agreement with China. The port also anticipates roughly a quarter of the usual arriving ships to be canceled in May.

The tariff escalation, initiated by President Trump's increase in tariffs on April 2nd, has led to retaliatory measures from both the US and China. Economist Torsten Slok foresees a potential recession this summer due to reduced imports, leading to layoffs and empty shelves.

Seroka suggests that retailers have approximately 5-7 weeks of inventory remaining before the effects of the reduced shipments become noticeable to consumers, potentially leading to less variety and higher prices for available goods. The article also mentions Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent describing the situation as "unsustainable."
chinese_title: 洛杉矶港称下周货运量将暴跌35%。
chinese_summary:
洛杉矶港预计下周货运量将大幅下降35%，原因是针对中国商品加征关税的影响。执行董事吉恩·塞罗卡将这种“急剧下降”归因于美国主要零售商暂停从中国发货。

中国约占该港口业务的45%，尽管一些公司可能会在东南亚寻找替代货源，但在没有与中国达成贸易协议的情况下，总体货运量预计仍将保持低位。该港口还预计5月份到达的船只将取消大约四分之一。

特朗普总统于4月2日提高关税引发了关税升级，导致美中两国采取了报复性措施。经济学家托斯顿·斯洛克预计，由于进口减少，今年夏天可能会出现经济衰退，导致裁员和货架空置。

塞罗卡表示，零售商大约还有5-7周的库存，之后消费者才能明显感受到货运量减少的影响，这可能会导致现有商品种类减少和价格上涨。文章还提到财政部长斯科特·贝森特将这种情况描述为“不可持续的”。

title: Duolingo will replace contract workers with AI
summary:
Duolingo CEO Luis von Ahn announced the company is shifting to an "AI-first" strategy, signaling significant changes in how the language learning platform operates. In an all-hands email, von Ahn stated that Duolingo will gradually replace contract workers with AI where possible, aiming to streamline content creation and remove bottlenecks.

This shift entails rethinking existing workflows and potentially rebuilding systems from scratch, as minor tweaks to human-centric processes won't suffice. New "constructive constraints" include prioritizing AI use in hiring processes, performance reviews, and headcount allocation. Teams will be expected to automate tasks before requesting additional personnel.

Von Ahn emphasizes that this isn't about replacing employees but rather freeing them to focus on creative and complex tasks. He believes AI is crucial for scaling content creation to reach more learners quickly and developing innovative features like Video Call. The move echoes a similar directive from Shopify CEO Tobi Lütke, who requires teams to justify new headcount by demonstrating they cannot achieve their goals using AI.

Despite the changes, von Ahn assures employees that Duolingo remains committed to their well-being and will provide training and support for integrating AI into their roles. He views this transition as a necessary step to advance Duolingo's mission and remain at the forefront of technology utilization.
chinese_title: 多邻国将用人工智能取代合同工。
chinese_summary:
多邻国CEO路易斯·冯·安宣布公司将转向“AI优先”战略，标志着该语言学习平台的运营方式将发生重大变化。冯·安在一封全体员工邮件中表示，多邻国将尽可能用AI逐步取代合同工，旨在简化内容创作并消除瓶颈。

这种转变需要重新思考现有的工作流程，并可能需要从头开始重建系统，因为对以人为中心的过程进行微调是不够的。新的“建设性约束”包括在招聘流程、绩效评估和人员配置中优先使用AI。各团队将被期望在请求额外人员之前先实现任务自动化。

冯·安强调，这并非要取代员工，而是让他们能够专注于创造性和复杂的工作。他认为，AI对于扩展内容创作以更快地触及更多学习者以及开发像视频通话这样的创新功能至关重要。此举与Shopify CEO托比·吕特克的类似指令相呼应，后者要求各团队通过证明他们无法使用AI实现其目标来证明新增人员的合理性。

尽管发生了变化，冯·安向员工保证，多邻国仍然致力于他们的福祉，并将提供培训和支持，以将AI融入他们的角色。他认为这种转变是推进多邻国使命并保持在技术利用前沿的必要一步。

title: Polygon Sold to Valnet and Hit with Mass Layoffs
summary:
Polygon, a prominent video game website founded in 2012 under Vox Media, has been sold to Valnet, a company known for operating content mills like Screen Rant and Game Rant. The sale has resulted in mass layoffs, impacting a significant portion of Polygon's staff, including co-founder and EIC Chris Plante, Senior Reporter Nicole Carpenter, and Senior Writer Michael McWhertor.

The announcement of the sale, confirmed via a press release, did not mention the layoffs. While some staff, such as Deputy Editor Maddy Myers and Games Editor Zoë Hannah, remain, the atmosphere is one of shock and job searching among former Polygon employees.

Valnet, run by Hassan Youssef, aims to strengthen its editorial presence with the acquisition of Polygon. However, Valnet's media holdings have been previously accused of exploitative practices. Former contributors have described working conditions at Valnet-owned sites as detrimental, labeling them as "one of the worst journalism publications" they've seen. The sale raises concerns about the future of Polygon's content and its reputation for quality journalism under its new ownership.

title: Firefox tab groups are here
summary:
Firefox has launched tab groups, a highly requested feature driven by community feedback through Mozilla Connect. The feature allows users to organize tabs into labeled and colored groups for better focus and decluttering, addressing the pain points of users managing numerous tabs.

The Firefox team actively engaged with the community, analyzing thousands of comments and suggestions to shape the feature. This collaboration led to a design that balances flexibility with simplicity, catering to both minimalists and power users.

Looking ahead, Firefox is experimenting with "smart tab groups," an AI-powered feature that suggests names and groups based on open tabs, all while prioritizing user privacy by keeping data on the device. This aims to further streamline tab management and enhance user workflow.

The article emphasizes the importance of community input in the development process and encourages users to continue sharing their ideas and feedback on Mozilla Connect. The team expresses gratitude for the community's contributions, stating that the feature wouldn't exist without their support.
chinese_title: Firefox标签页分组功能已上线
chinese_summary:
Firefox推出标签页分组功能，该功能深受用户欢迎，由Mozilla Connect上的社区反馈驱动。此功能允许用户将标签页组织成带有标签和颜色的分组，以更好地集中注意力并减少混乱，从而解决用户管理大量标签页的痛点。

Firefox团队积极与社区互动，分析了数千条评论和建议，以塑造该功能。这种协作促成了一种设计，该设计在灵活性和简洁性之间取得了平衡，既满足了极简主义者也满足了高级用户的需求。

展望未来，Firefox正在尝试“智能标签页分组”，这是一项由人工智能驱动的功能，可根据打开的标签页建议名称和分组，同时通过将数据保存在设备上来优先考虑用户隐私。这旨在进一步简化标签页管理并增强用户工作流程。

文章强调了社区输入在开发过程中的重要性，并鼓励用户继续在Mozilla Connect上分享他们的想法和反馈。该团队对社区的贡献表示感谢，并表示如果没有他们的支持，该功能将不会存在。

title: Only Teslas exempt from new auto tariffs thanks to 85% domestic content rule
summary:

title: Qwen3: Think deeper, act faster
summary:
Qwen3, the latest iteration in the Qwen family of large language models, has been released, boasting improvements in coding, math, and general capabilities compared to other top-tier models. Two Mixture of Experts (MoE) models, Qwen3-235B-A22B and Qwen3-30B-A3B, along with six dense models ranging from 0.6B to 32B parameters, are open-weighted under the Apache 2.0 license.

Key features of Qwen3 include hybrid thinking modes, offering both step-by-step reasoning ("Thinking Mode") and quick responses ("Non-Thinking Mode") to optimize performance and cost efficiency. It also supports 119 languages and dialects, expanding its global reach. Agentic capabilities have been optimized, with enhanced support for tool calling.

Qwen3 was pre-trained on approximately 36 trillion tokens across 119 languages, utilizing data from web sources, PDF documents, and synthetically generated math and code data. The pre-training process involved three stages focused on basic language skills, knowledge-intensive data, and long-context handling.

Post-training involved a four-stage pipeline to develop the hybrid reasoning capabilities, including long CoT cold start, reasoning-based RL, thinking mode fusion, and general RL.

The article also provides code examples for using Qwen3 with Hugging Face transformers, SGLang, and vLLM, including examples for toggling between the thinking modes. Instructions for using the model locally with Ollama, LMStudio, llama.cpp, and KTransformers are included.

The release aims to empower researchers and developers to build innovative solutions, and the team welcomes contributions to further improve the Qwen models. Future work will focus on enhancing the models across multiple dimensions towards AGI and ASI.

Qwen3 的主要特点包括混合思考模式，提供逐步推理（“思考模式”）和快速响应（“非思考模式”），以优化性能和成本效益。它还支持 119 种语言和方言，扩大了其全球影响力。智能体能力得到了优化，增强了对工具调用的支持。

Qwen3 在大约 36 万亿个 tokens 上进行了预训练，涵盖 119 种语言，使用了来自网络资源、PDF 文档以及合成生成的数学和代码数据。预训练过程包括三个阶段，重点关注基本语言技能、知识密集型数据和长上下文处理。

后训练涉及一个四阶段的流程，以开发混合推理能力，包括长 CoT 冷启动、基于推理的 RL、思考模式融合和通用 RL。

文章还提供了使用 Hugging Face transformers、SGLang 和 vLLM 的 Qwen3 代码示例，包括切换思考模式的示例。包括使用 Ollama、LMStudio、llama.cpp 和 KTransformers 在本地使用模型的说明。

此次发布旨在帮助研究人员和开发人员构建创新解决方案，团队欢迎大家贡献力量，进一步改进通义千问模型。未来的工作将侧重于在多个维度上增强模型，以实现 AGI 和 ASI。
